DOC.HEADLINE: VENTURA COUNTY REVIEW : SIEMENS FINISHES SOLAR ELECTRIFICATION PROJECT
DOC.TEXT: Camarillo-based Siemens Solar Industries has completed what it calls the largest solar home electrification project in the United States . The project , which will provide photovoltaic or solar_power to 108 homes_in the Sacramento area , was installed by Siemens in cooperation with the Sacramento Municipal Utility District . The district is seeking clean , renewable power sources that will minimize the so-called greenhouse_effect . The project uses Siemens M55 solar_panels that generate a total of 400 kilowatts of electricity . Each home_in the project is equipped with solar_panels that will generate power throughout the grid . Siemens , the world ' s largest supplier of solar products , hopes to install similar systems worldwide .
